text: 19.29 Apo 20.4, 27.2, Lom 16.23, 1 Ko 1.14, Kol 4.10, Plm 24 Meg mɨgan dad aplanɨl ag amɨl apɨl gɨlaknɨŋ, binɨb taun anɨb ak kuŋay yɨbɨl owlak. Apɨl, Pol bɨne omɨŋal ak kɨlop lɨpɨg dad takaw agep tep ak amnɨlak. Bɨne omɨŋal anɨb ak, ne ayɨp Masedoniya nɨb ap yelek. Yɨb kɨli ak, Gayus ayɨp Alistakus ayɨp.
